page.title: 09CWMGORS VALLEY TROOPERS
page.content: THERE ARE THIRTY TWO MEMBERS OF THE BAND AT PRESENT. WHEN WE ARE READY TO COMPETE THERE SHOULD BE TWENTY THREE MEMBERS ON THE FIELD. THE PATTERN OF STARTING THE COMPETITION IS SEEN BELOW. LEADER DRUM MAJOR MASCOT 1ST RANK 1ST RANK 1ST RANK 2ND 2ND 2ND 3RD 3RD 3RD 4TH 4TH 4TH 5TH 5TH 5TH SIDE DRUMMER SIDE DRUMMER TOM TOM SIDE DRUMMER BASE DRUMMER PENALTY POINTS CAN BE AWARDED FOR BASIC MISTAKES SUCH AS NOT KEEPING IN LINE WITH THE MEMBER IN FRONT OR LOSING OUT ON STEPS IN COORDINATION WITH THE BEAT.
